TopicTitle: Something to make custom orbit guidelines like the career mode ones

Articles.Content:
Those blue line things, there is no object there, they just serve to show you what orbit you need. I want to be able to put something like "An apoapsis of \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ and periapsis of \_\_\_\_\_\_\_ on the planet \_\_\_\_\_\_\_ with the inclination \_\_ (Can be a digit, or select a body to match inclinations with)" to get an example orbit.

EDIT:It would also be nice if I could make them permanent and add a custom color to them, so I can tell at a glance which planet it is.
